name: Skimfos the Consumed
aura: Increases Ally ATK in Doom Tower Battles by 30%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 35% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 35% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 10%.
skills.name: Growing Hunger

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. After attacking, transfers all debuffs except [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Provoke], [Petrification] from all allies to this Champion.

skills.desc:
Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP for each debuff on them at the start of each turn. 

If this Champion is under 4 or more debuffs at the start of the turn, places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Twisted [P]
